PathUID.description: The UID of the path bombs will fly along.

Speed.description: The speed this bomb will fly at toward its target (the end of the given path).

OnlyOnce.description: Whether this event occurs only once, or can happen multiple times.

Event0_Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Event0_Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Event0_Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Event1_Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Event1_Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Event1_Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Event2_Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Event2_Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Event2_Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

GismoTargets.description: The gismos that will explode when the bomb reaches the end of the path.

Extra.value: Event objects which cause bombs to fly along a given path and explode when they reach the end.
